title: Can't connect to Linux Hyper-V Machines, RDCman works fine
author: davi2td
body_snippet:

Can't connect to Debian 10 , Latest Hyper-v supported version per : [Debian-Supported-Hyper-v](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/virtualization/hyper-v/supported-debian-virtual-machines-on-hyper-v)

Successfully connect to guest Linux OS.
